statements: SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, viewership FROM Shows WHERE airing_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY viewership DESC;
SELECT show_name, viewership, advertising_revenue FROM Shows WHERE viewership >= 10000 AND advertising_revenue <= 5000;
SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE show_name LIKE '%Game%' ORDER BY airing_time ASC;
SELECT AVG(viewership) AS avg_viewership, SUM(advertising_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Shows;
SELECT show_id, show_name, airing_time, viewership, advertising_revenue FROM Shows WHERE viewership > 100000 ORDER BY viewership DESC;
SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE advertising_revenue BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY show_name ASC;
SELECT show_name, viewership FROM Shows WHERE airing_time < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY viewership DESC, show_name ASC;
SELECT show_name FROM Shows WHERE viewership > 50000 AND advertising_revenue > 2000 ORDER BY show_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT AVG(viewership) AS average_viewership, MAX(viewership) AS max_viewership FROM Shows WHERE airing_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tv_shows;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM tv_shows WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT * FROM tv_shows ORDER BY viewership DESC;
SELECT show_name, rating FROM tv_shows WHERE rating > 8;
SELECT ad_name, ad_duration, ad_cost FROM advertising ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND rating >= 8.0
SELECT show_name, genre, viewership FROM tv_shows ORDER BY viewership DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost FROM advertising WHERE ad_cost > 5000 ORDER BY ad_cost
SELECT show_name, viewership, rating FROM tv_shows WHERE genre IN ('Drama', 'Mystery') ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT ad_name, ad_duration, ROUND(ad_cost * 1.1, 2) AS ad_cost_with_tax FROM advertising WHERE ad_duration > 30
SELECT * FROM tv_show_popularity;
SELECT show_id, show_name FROM tv_show_popularity ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC;
SELECT show_name, popularity_rating FROM tv_show_popularity WHERE popularity_rating > 4;
SELECT show_id, viewership_count FROM viewership_statistics WHERE viewership_count >= 100000 ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT show_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT show_name, popularity_rating FROM tv_show_popularity WHERE popularity_rating > 8.0 ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, show_id, viewership_count FROM viewership_statistics WHERE viewership_count > 10000 ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT show_id, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 5000.00 ORDER BY revenue DESC;

SELECT show_name, popularity_rating, revenue FROM tv_show_popularity JOIN advertising_revenue ON tv_show_popularity.show_id = advertising_revenue.show_id WHERE popularity_rating > 7.5 ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC, revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewership_statistics JOIN tv_show_popularity ON viewership_statistics.show_id = tv_show_popularity.show_id WHERE viewership_count < 5000 ORDER BY viewership_count ASC;
SELECT show_name, genre, release_year FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT director_name, show_name, genre FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT * FROM Viewership_Stats WHERE viewership_count > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT show_id, revenue_amount, advertiser_name FROM Advertising_Revenue;
SELECT show_name, start_time, end_time, channel FROM Broadcast_Schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT show_name, release_year FROM TV_Shows ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TV_Shows WHERE director_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT show_name, director_name, channel FROM TV_Shows JOIN Broadcast_Schedule ON TV_Shows.show_id = Broadcast_Schedule.show_id WHERE channel = 'ABC';
SELECT show_name, viewership_count, average_rating FROM TV_Shows JOIN Viewership_Stats ON TV_Shows.show_id = Viewership_Stats.show_id WHERE viewership_count > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Shows;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM Shows ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT show_name, genre, release_year FROM Shows WHERE genre='Comedy';
SELECT show_name, ad_revenue FROM Shows INNER JOIN Advertising ON Shows.show_id = Advertising.show_id;

SELECT show_name, network_name FROM Shows INNER JOIN ShowNetworkMapping ON Shows.show_id = ShowNetworkMapping.show_id INNER JOIN Networks ON ShowNetworkMapping.network_id = Networks.network_id ORDER BY network_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM Shows WHERE genre='Drama';
SELECT Shows.show_name, Viewership.viewership_count FROM Shows INNER JOIN Viewership ON Shows.show_id = Viewership.show_id;
SELECT Advertising.advertiser_name, Shows.show_name, Advertising.ad_revenue FROM Advertising INNER JOIN Shows ON Advertising.show_id = Shows.show_id;

SELECT Shows.show_name, Networks.network_name FROM Shows INNER JOIN ShowNetworkMapping ON Shows.show_id = ShowNetworkMapping.show_id INNER JOIN Networks ON ShowNetworkMapping.network_id = Networks.network_id;
